description: Execution of plink to perform data exfiltration and tunneling
author: Florian Roth
name: Potential RDP Tunneling Via SSH Plink
query: (((process.executable.text:*\\plink.exe AND process.command_line.text:*\:127.0.0.1\:3389*)) OR ((process.executable.text:*\\plink.exe AND process.command_line.text:*\:3389* AND process.command_line.text:(*\ \-P\ 443* OR *\ \-P\ 22*))))
